summary: Bruges is a city in Belgium, known for its historic center, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It's the capital of West Flanders province and the sixth largest city in Belgium. The city covers over 140 square kilometers, including an area by the sea called Zeebrugge. Bruges is often called the "Venice of the North" due to its canals. It was once a major commercial hub and now attracts many tourists. The city is also home to the College of Europe, a prestigious institute for European studies.
title: Bruges
